scripts.chatbot-stop:
bash -lc '
      ROOT=$(pwd)
      PID_DIR="$ROOT/logs/pids"
      AGENT_PID_FILE="$PID_DIR/agent.pid"
      FRONT_PID_FILE="$PID_DIR/frontend.pid"
      if [[ -f "$AGENT_PID_FILE" ]]; then
        AGENT_PID=$(cat "$AGENT_PID_FILE")
        kill -TERM "-$AGENT_PID" 2>/dev/null || kill "$AGENT_PID" 2>/dev/null || true
        rm -f "$AGENT_PID_FILE"
      fi
      if [[ -f "$FRONT_PID_FILE" ]]; then
        FRONT_PID=$(cat "$FRONT_PID_FILE")
        kill -TERM "-$FRONT_PID" 2>/dev/null || kill "$FRONT_PID" 2>/dev/null || true
        rm -f "$FRONT_PID_FILE"
      fi
      # Fallback: ensure common dev ports are freed
      for p in 5173 5174 5175; do
        lsof -ti tcp:$p | xargs -r kill;
      done
      # Stop dockerized services
      (cd ai-chatbot-weaviate && (docker compose down || docker-compose down || true))
      docker ps --filter "name=dank" -q | xargs -r docker rm -f || true
    '
